import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';// 导入19个页面组件
import MainPage from'./pages/MainPage';import AddAirplane from'./pages/AddAirplane';import AddAirport from'./pages/AddAirport';import AddPerson from'./pages/AddPerson';import GrantOrRevokeLicense from'./pages/GrantOrRevokeLicense';import OfferFlight from'./pages/OfferFlight';import FlightLanding from'./pages/FlightLanding';import FlightTakeoff from'./pages/FlightTakeoff';import PassengersBoard from'./pages/PassengersBoard';import PassengersDisembark from'./pages/PassengersDisembark';import AssignPilot from'./pages/AssignPilot';import RecycleCrew from'./pages/RecycleCrew';import RetireFlight from'./pages/RetireFlight';import SimulationCycle from'./pages/SimulationCycle';import FlightsInTheAir from'./pages/FlightsInTheAir';import FlightsOnTheGround from'./pages/FlightsOnTheGround';import PeopleInTheAir from'./pages/PeopleInTheAir';import PeopleOnTheGround from'./pages/PeopleOnTheGround';import RouteSummary from'./pages/RouteSummary';import AlternateAirports from'./pages/AlternateAirports';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){// currentPage 存储当前页面标识，默认显示 MainPage
const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState('MainPage');// 根据 currentPage 决定渲染哪个组件
const renderPage=()=>{switch(currentPage){case'MainPage':// 传入 onChangePage 回调，用于在 MainPage 里切换页面
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainPage,{onChangePage:setCurrentPage});case'AddAirplane':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddAirplane,{});case'AddAirport':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddAirport,{});case'AddPerson':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddPerson,{});case'GrantOrRevokeLicense':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GrantOrRevokeLicense,{});case'OfferFlight':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OfferFlight,{});case'FlightLanding':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FlightLanding,{});case'FlightTakeoff':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FlightTakeoff,{});case'PassengersBoard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PassengersBoard,{});case'PassengersDisembark':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PassengersDisembark,{});case'AssignPilot':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AssignPilot,{});case'RecycleCrew':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecycleCrew,{});case'RetireFlight':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RetireFlight,{});case'SimulationCycle':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SimulationCycle,{});case'FlightsInTheAir':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FlightsInTheAir,{});case'FlightsOnTheGround':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FlightsOnTheGround,{});case'PeopleInTheAir':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PeopleInTheAir,{});case'PeopleOnTheGround':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PeopleOnTheGround,{});case'RouteSummary':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RouteSummary,{});case'AlternateAirports':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlternateAirports,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Page Not Found"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Airline Management System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-content",children:renderPage()})]});}export default App;
